title: Let's Talk About Yorick Skins
body:
Now, there are thousands of threads on here that talk about the fact that yorick hasnt received a skin since his release, but lately, I have realized how INSANELY easy Yorick skin concepts really are. 
Example 1
Snow Day Yorick- instead of a lantern on his back, make it a Christmas tree and make him spawn penguins/reindeer/any type of winter animal.  
Example 2
Super Galaxy Yorick- He spawns little aliens in space suits instead of ghosts
Example 3
Puppet Master Yorick- Ultimate/Legendary Skin idea, he spawns heads of champions that float around but they are controlled by strings

Just wanted to put my ideas for relatively easy and simple Yorick skins

replies.body:
>Now, there are thousands of threads on here that talk about the fact that yorick hasnt received a skin since his release, but lately, I have realized how INSANELY easy Yorick skin concepts really are.

After his rework, he'll get some. That's the only reason why he hasn't gotten a skin, it's not because they forgot about him. There's a reason he's not in the weekly rotation either.
